main event: Several mature observers on Guam reported witnessing a pear-shaped greenish whitish unidentified flying object on November 11, 1961.
interesting points: The object occasionally appeared to be partially bluish and reddish as well., The sighting was observed at four different points on the island by five mature observers., The object moved in a horizontal and westerly direction and made no sound., There were no known aircraft in the vicinity at the time of the sighting., The total length of the observation was approximately 30 seconds.
sighted object: pear-shaped greenish whitish unidentified flying object
witnesses: mature observers at different points on the island
